m_szDocSumamry: Latest:Archive:2010:Jul-Sep "Latest Features" Archive: July - September 2010 Click here for most recent "latest" listings. 2010 Latest:Archive:2010:Oct-Dec - going forward in time. September Feature : Contests / Grid > GE Ecomagination Challenge - In addition to prize money for the best ideas, GE and its funding partners have allocated $200 million to go toward the development of key concepts that will help reshape the grid, whether it be by providing more affordable and stable clean power, or help with the transmission, or help in the efficiency on the consumption end.  See the NEC's proposal
